entry.title: Book: Romeo & Juliet, by Shakespeare (1597) (2)
entry.content: Finished it this morning. The last Act is definitely not as memorable to me, but the last verse is very beautiful.

entry.title: Book: Romeo & Juliet, by Shakespeare (1597)
entry.content: I started reading this because Ayame's class in school was. I greatly enjoy it. The little poems in the first half are so cute and clever. I'm now in Act III and I don't like it as much, but I recognize its necessity for the tragedy of the first two Acts to be realized. I just read Act III/Scene II and it is curious how casually Juliet talks about having sex with Romeo that night to seal their marriage.
